welcome.title: Welcome to Cima Sync!
welcome.subtitle: Your tool for automatic authentication at UABC

step1.title: Welcome to Cima Sync
step1.description: This app helps you authenticate automatically in UABC's captive portal. Select your preferred language to get started.

step2.title: Save your session if you want
step2.description: Enable 'Remember session' so the app tries to login automatically.

step3.title: Privacy
step3.description: Your credentials are stored locally and you can wipe data from Settings.
